name: Dragon Down
description:
Controls:

  •     Up: Arrow Up
  •    Down: Arrow Down
  •    Left: Arrow Left
  •    Right: Arrow Right
  •    Take Action: Z

The main character can also be controlled by clicking and dragging the mouse and single clicking to take an action.

DragonDown is an RPG I'm pulling together for itch.io's Devtober 2021.  I'm a big fan of the classic SNES RPGs and wanted to try my hand at one.  At this point the game is more of an early tech demo with very little game play wise, but I want to share what I have to far with the game jam folks.
